name: Pokémon Version Émeraude Plus
overview: The rom, based on Pokémon Emerald Version, offers you several modes from the beginning of the game: the famous Nuzlock, the inversion of the relations between types, the randomizer, the possibility to change the music of a city by a panel, the adjustment of the levels of the opposing Pokémon, an increase of the frequency of Shiny, and many other functions. The Metamo Cave, which can be unlocked after defeating Marc, finally finds its use in this rom! Other places like the Workshop Cave or the Deep Cave also gain new attractions.
